metadata.title: CVE-2024-26143 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Rails is a web-application framework. There is a possible XSS vulnerabilitywhen using the translation helpers in Action Controller. Applications usingtranslation methods like translate, or t on a controller, with a key endingin "_html", a :default key which contains untrusted user input, and theresulting string is used in a view, may be susceptible to an XSSvulnerability. The vulnerability is fixed in 7.1.3.1 and 7.0.8.1.

criterions.comment: rails package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
